name: iip-map
description: WordPress plugin used to embed Google maps and populate it with data via the Screendoor API
author: Office of Design, Bureau of International Information Programs, U.S. Department of State

scripts.build: npm run build:admin && npm run build:front
scripts.build:admin: npm run build --prefix ./admin/js && npm run cssAdmin
scripts.setup: npm install && npm run setup:admin && npm run setup:front
